channel.title: [PI] - Run.Bat Problems For Win7 Users? (Please Help)
channel.description:
Hi , Iv'e made a post about this earlier but no one even gave me a reasonable reply.
So I'm re-making this. Basicly, what my problem is, I have my server up and running, 2 of my friends log in, using WINDOWS 7 With no problem at ALL! In the client they used the Win7 Run.Bat, everything went smooth. Off to the real problem.
Now, I have 2 other friends that use Windows 7 as WELL! Friend #1: His PC can't start the Run.bat up.(I have tried to give him numerous Run.bats!)
Friend #2: His PC loads the client, but when he tries to logon, it says, "Error Connecting To Server".
WHAT THE HELL?
Now, I don't know much about this 32-Bit and 64-Bit shit, But I do remember that some Windows 7 PC's use either one, depending if they have a Home Premium, or Ultimate.
I am guessing my other 2 friends use 64-Bit Windows 7 PC's
The friends that are having problems are using 32-Bit Windows 7 PC's
I will paste the Windows 7 Run.bats My 2 friends that had gotten onto the client and logged in with the 2 friends that used them, and came up with problems!
NOTE: This is A PI SERVER! BELOW!: \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
Windows 7 Run.Bat (Remember, 2 friends used this with no prob, 2 used this with a problem!
[code=javascript]@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
[/code]
PLEASE Help Me out AND my 2 friends, they really want to play, and if someone solved this, I think it would be A help to ANYONE that has this problem!
Again... Thank you!
P.S: Please don't give me any crap about, "Oh did you change the IP in the client?" Ofcourse I did if 2 friends had already gotten on...
P.S#2: If you want to see pictures, I will gladly post them in time, just depends when I get back in contact with my friends.
P.S#3: EVERYTHING is fine except this Windows 7 problem, and since the damn majority of the U.S uses crappy ass Vista PC's and Windows 7, I am basicly screwed to having a nice RSPS community on my Server.
Thanks :P
-Danny

item.title: [PI] - Run.Bat Problems For Win7 Users? (Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Thanks, I’ll give it to both of them tommorow, see if it works for them, and I’ll get back to this thread if it does work.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - Run.Bat Problems For Win7 Users? (Please Help)

item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Hi , Iv’e made a post about this earlier but no one even gave me a reasonable reply.

So I’m re-making this.
Basicly, what my problem is, I have my server up and running, 2 of my friends log in, using WINDOWS 7 With no problem at ALL! In the client they used the Win7 Run.Bat, everything went smooth. Off to the real problem.

Now, I have 2 other friends that use Windows 7 as WELL!

Friend #2: His PC loads the client, but when he tries to logon, it says, “Error Connecting To Server”.

WHAT THE HELL?

Now, I don’t know much about this 32-Bit and 64-Bit shit, But I do remember that some Windows 7 PC’s use either one, depending if they have a Home Premium, or Ultimate.

The friends that are having problems are using 32-Bit Windows 7 PC’s

BELOW!:
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

Windows 7 Run.Bat (Remember, 2 friends used this with no prob, 2 used this with a problem!

title Client
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

PLEASE Help Me out AND my 2 friends, they really want to play, and if someone solved this, I think it would be A help to ANYONE that has this problem!
